thread.title: All 10 S&P 500 sectors extend losses suffered in August
thread.title_full: All 10 S&P 500 sectors extend losses suffered in August - MarketWatch

author: Tomi Kilgore
title: All 10 S&P 500 sectors extend losses suffered in August
text: All 10 of the S&P 500's SPX, -2.53% key sectors were falling in morning trade Tuesday, adding to the losses they all suffered in August. The biggest loser on Tuesday was energy, as the SPDR Energy ETF XLE, -3.13% shed 2.4%. The XLE had soared 12% over the past four sessions, as oil prices logged a historic rally over the last three days, but still dropped 4.3% for the month. Elsewhere, the SPDR Financial ETF XLF, -3.05% dropped 2%, the SPDR Health Care ETF XLV, -2.17% lost 1.9% and the SPDR Utilities ETF XLU, -2.28% slid 1.9%.
